Articles.Content: Is Kerbal Space Program on Steam's Green light? If it isn't may I suggest it be put on there. It looks like a great way to atleast get some more people into buying the game.

And more posts like this! Yay!!! According to a recent interview, they are going to get KSP on Steam soon-ish (I shouldn't say that because of dates.) We get many posts asking this and I think I like them
This has been suggested many times. Lots of people here dislike steam for odd reasons too, expect them to complain about this. lol

Ryan7183, please see this thread, and every other thread that mentions putting KSP on Steam

Seeing as this thread isn't really needed, I'm going to close it
